identity.name: EHSAS - Elden Heights School Alumni Society

rules: Use Playfair Display for all Headings (H1-H3).
Use Manrope for all body text, UI elements, and dense data.
Use Cormorant Garamond in Italic for quotes or 'Established' dates.
Headings must never be pure black. Use Primary Navy (#1A2A4A).
Letter spacing: Tight for headings (-0.02em), Wide for captions (0.05em).

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) on the main background to simulate paper.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Double Borders' for cards: A 1px solid border in neutral-200, plus a 4px top border in Gold (#C9A227) or Navy (#1A2A4A).
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use heavy blur (backdrop-blur-xl) with a warm tint (bg-[#F9F7F1]/80) for sticky headers.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle paper textures. Gradients allowed only on text (Gold gradient for special emphasis).

grid_strategies.spotlight: Grid Mode A (Tetris): Hero alumni on left (col-span-8), list on right (col-span-4).
grid_strategies.directory: Grid Mode B (Density): Repeatable cards, grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4, gap-6.

buttons.primary: bg-[#1A2A4A] text-white hover:bg-[#243B53] rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-medium tracking-wide shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#1A2A4A] text-[#1A2A4A] hover:bg-[#1A2A4A] hover:text-white rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all duration-300
buttons.gold: bg-[#C9A227] text-[#1A2A4A] hover:bg-[#E3C565] rounded-sm px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-md

cards.style: bg-white dark:bg-[#1E293B] border border-[#1A2A4A]/10 rounded-sm p-6 hover:border-[#C9A227]/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: bg-white border border-neutral-300 focus:border-[#1A2A4A] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#1A2A4A] rounded-sm h-12 px-4

hero_bg.desc: Classic university building with brick and ivy

motion.scroll_reveal: Use IntersectionObserver to fade-in elements upwards (translate-y-4 -> translate-y-0, opacity-0 -> opacity-100).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1. Use darker navy for text on cream backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus ring: ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-[#1A2A4A].
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent: THEME SETUP: Implement the 'Ivy Archive' theme. Default to Light Mode (Cream background).
NAVBAR: Create a sticky navbar with a 'Glass' effect but warm tint. Logo on left, Links center, 'Join' button right.
HERO SECTION: Use the 'hero_bg' image with a dark navy overlay (opacity 60%). Center text. H1 in Playfair Display Gold/White.
ABOUT SECTION: Use a split layout. Text on left (Navy on Cream), 'community' image on right with a Gold border offset.
DIRECTORY: Use a dense grid. Each card looks like a sophisticated ID card. Photo, Name (Playfair), Batch (Gold badge), Profession.
ADMIN PANEL: Keep it clean and functional. Sidebar navigation. Use Shadcn tables for data.
FOOTER: Massive footer. Deep Navy background. Gold text for headers. 4 columns. Copyright section at bottom.
CRITICAL: Do not use standard 'Blue' for links. Use Navy (#1A2A4A) with an underline that appears on hover.
TESTING: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and links.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts without purpose.
Use 2-3x more padding than you think is necessary. Luxury = Space.
Micro-interactions are mandatory. Buttons must scale/shift on hover.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or noise textures.
